name: Dragon Run (itch) (Coffee Sloth Productions)
description:
Dragon Run is a platformer where patience is the key.   In this game, your character is a dragon & you must flap your wings to make it to the goal without touching anything.  Navigate through 10 action packed levels where you must dodge fireballs and enemies.  Collect all 12 coins and beat the level within 60 seconds in order to earn a 3 star rating!

This is my first game, so leave your feedback in the comments below.
